Summary: This document provides a quick guide for students on how to use NUS TalentConnect for experiential learning opportunities. The key steps include logging in to the platform, accessing the Experiential Learning Record, and selecting the NUS-ISS programmes to apply for.

To view available job and internship opportunities for NUS-ISS programmes, go to the Jobs & Internships / Job Search page and use the 'Position Type' field to filter for NUS-ISS internships. Select the 'Internships - NUS-ISS' checkbox and click 'Apply'.

The NUS TalentConnect Quick Guide explains how to narrow your internship search to opportunities posted under specific NUS-ISS internship programs. By clicking on "More Filters" and selecting the relevant program, you can find internships that fulfill your graduation requirements.
